name: Magic Hour
headline: Platform for AI video generation.
description:
Magic Hour is a professional video creation tool. 

It takes the best AI video models, puts them in one workflow, and makes creating an amazing video as easy as selecting a template and customizing it.

You can use the product at https://magichour.ai
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:b2b; industry:video; industry:media; industry:creator-economy; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Runbo Li, Founder
founders.description: Runbo is the co-founder and CEO of Magic Hour. Previously, he was a senior data scientist at Meta where he worked on numerous zero-to-one consumer social products at NPE (New Product Experimentation).

founders.name: David Hu, Founder
founders.description: David is the co-founder and CTO of Magic Hour. Previously, he worked as a full stack engineer at Skillz, leading multiple product development teams from Series B to IPO. He worked across the entire tech stack, from user interface down to infrastructure management.

# Create Engaging Videos Like a Pro
Magic Hour is an all-in-one **AI video creation platform** that streamlines content production from ideation to production. Now **anyone** can create engaging videos easier than ever.
[Create a Free Video](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
[![Product Hunt 3rd Product of the Day](https://d28dkohlqf5vwj.cloudfront.net/product-hunt.png)](https://magichour.ai/<https:/www.producthunt.com/products/magic-hour-2#magic-hour-2>)
[![main banner image](https://d28dkohlqf5vwj.cloudfront.net/landing/creator-5.png)](https://magichour.ai/<https:/twitter.com/zeng_wt/status/1737858025975599396>)
[![main banner image](https://d28dkohlqf5vwj.cloudfront.net/landing/creator-4.png)](https://magichour.ai/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=6zDUqDZSvgM>)
[![main banner image](https://d28dkohlqf5vwj.cloudfront.net/landing/creator-3.png)](https://magichour.ai/<https:/www.producthunt.com/products/magic-hour-2?comment=3052879#magic-hour-2>)
[![main banner image](https://d28dkohlqf5vwj.cloudfront.net/landing/creator-2.png)](https://magichour.ai/<https:/www.producthunt.com/products/magic-hour-2/reviews?review=713920>)

## Perfect for Creators, Marketers, and Producers
Magic Hour helps professionals **speed up production** , and enables consumers to make **professional-quality content** without years of experience.
Music VideosSportsMarketing
## Powerful Tools Simple Creation
Whatever your content needs, we have the right tool to help you scale.
Video-to-Video
Apply style transfer or change the subjects in any video.
[Learn More about Video-to-Video](https://magichour.ai/</products/video-to-video>)
Face Swap
Make yourself the star of any video with high-quality face swaps.
[Learn More about Face Swap](https://magichour.ai/</products/face-swap>)
Image-to-Video
Turn your favorite images into stunning videos.
[Learn More about Image-to-Video](https://magichour.ai/</products/image-to-video>)
Animation
Create stop-motion style animations that flow. Includes image-to-video.
[Learn More about Animation](https://magichour.ai/</products/animation>)
Text-to-Video
Create realistic and consistent videos from text.
[Learn More about Text-to-Video](https://magichour.ai/</products/text-to-video>)
Lip Sync
Make any person speak any audio.
[Learn More about Lip Sync](https://magichour.ai/</products/lip-sync>)
## Use Templates to Quickly Create Effortlessly
Unlock thousands of templates and effects to meet your audience where they are.
  * [ 87Basketball Players on Fire](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
  * [ 57Sub-Zero](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
  * [ 54Superman](https://magichour.ai/</create>)

  * [ 33Hercules](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
  * [ 31Kintsugi Marble](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
  * [ 29Flash](https://magichour.ai/</create>)
  * [ 28Black Panther](https://magichour.ai/</create>)

generated_description:
### Magic Hour: An AI-Powered Video Creation Platform

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator’s W24 batch, Magic Hour is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize video creation using artificial intelligence. With a compact team of just two, Magic Hour aims to simplify the video production process so that anyone—from seasoned professionals to casual creators—can make stunning videos without the steep learning curve traditionally associated with video editing.

**What They Do:**
Magic Hour stands out as an all-in-one platform for AI video generation. The technology harnesses top-of-the-line AI models, streamlining the video production process through an easy-to-use workflow. Users can quickly create high-quality videos simply by selecting a template and customizing it to fit their needs.

The platform offers a variety of tools designed for different types of content, including:
- **Video-to-Video:** Change the style or subjects in any video. 
- **Face Swap:** Superimpose your face onto any video with high fidelity.
- **Image-to-Video:** Transform still images into captivating video clips.
- **Animation:** Create fluid animations including stop-motion styles.
- **Text-to-Video:** Generate videos that reflect the narrative from a supplied text.
- **Lip Sync:** Make any character or person speak in sync with audio. 

Magic Hour even provides thousands of templates designed to cater to various audiences, from basketball fans to superhero aficionados.

**Why It Matters:**
At its core, Magic Hour is about democratizing video creation. By reducing barriers to entry and making high-quality content accessible, it empowers marketers, creators, and everyday consumers to produce engaging media that can captivate audiences. There are no prerequisites, no lengthy tutorials—just the simplicity of selecting a template and unlocking creativity.

**Key Points:**
- **Location:** San Francisco, CA.
- **Team Size:** 2 employees.
- **Y Combinator Batch:** W24.
- **Current Users:** Over 1.7 million creators trust the platform.
- **Website:** [Magic Hour](https://magichour.ai)

**Conclusion:**
In a world where video content continues to dominate the digital landscape, Magic Hour is strategically positioned at the intersection of creativity and technology. With its user-friendly approach, it’s paving the way for the next wave of content creation, empowering everyone to unleash their inner filmmaker, whether they're creating a marketing campaign or a personal project.
